statements: DELETE FROM employee_profiles WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM employee_profiles WHERE skills @> ARRAY['Java','Python'];
DELETE FROM EmployeeSkill WHERE employee_id = 100 AND skill_name = 'Programming';
DELETE FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE department = 'HR' AND hire_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM achievements WHERE employee_id = 101 AND DATE(date_achieved) < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM CareerHistory WHERE employee_id = (SELECT employee_id FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE full_name = 'John Doe');
